comment.author: 56077378@N06
comment._content:
Based on another old photo on page 3 of Hull st, I think this is an older/earlier photo of
Jeff Davis and Hull. Hull running left to right and Jeff Davis at center bottom. JD then crosses Hull and turns into Cowardin. Just a quess.

comment.author: 56047933@N00
comment._content: You can see the old street car tracks that turned off of Cary st and went down Pine st. They went all the way down to Grace Arents school and turned at China st. I remember seeing them as a child.
